rule:
Inside each

tag, there must be at least one tag to emphasize a key word or phrase.
input: Honesty is valuable. Kindness is appreciated. Patience is rewarding.
evaluation:
The chatbot output consists of three sentences, each enclosed within a

tag, which satisfies the requirement of having at least three

tags. Each sentence includes a tag and at least one tag, fulfilling the requirement to emphasize key words and phrases within the

tags. There is no requirement to have multiple tags in each

, so the output meets the description provided. No violation. OK
